ModMetaData.name: Irn Bru And Other Scottish Delicacies
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
IRN-BRU

Scotland's other national drink, now available for consumption on the rimworlds!

- Made at the brewing table using steel.
- 20 steel produces 5 bottles of Bru.
- Provides some nutrition and recreation.
- Has a mass of 0.2 and a market value of 1.
- Gives a +3 mood bonus for 6 hours when consumed.
- Appears under the 'Manufactured' category in stockpiles (remember to update yours).
- Pawns will automatically drink this if they are in need of recreation.
- Requires refigeration or freezing, with a rot time of 3 days.

Irn-Bru is a registered trademark of AG Barr plc and is used with permission.

DEEP-FRIED CHOCOLATE

Another delicacy often associated with Scotland makes its way to the rimworlds.

-Made at a campfire, fueled stove or electric stove using chocolate.
-10 chocolate produces 5 deep-fried chocolate.
- Counts as a simple meal.
- Has the same mass as regular chocolate, but half the market value.
- Gives a +3 mood bonus for 6 hours when consumed.
- Appears under the 'Foods' category in stockpiles (remember to update yours).
- Requires refigeration or freezing, with a rot time of 1 day.

HAGGIS

Scotland's national dish makes its way to the rimworlds.

- Made at a campfire, fueled stove or electric stove using any kind of meat.
- Counts as a fine meal.
- Provides a +3 bonus to mood for 6 hours when consumed.
